title: Obsidian Plugin Manifest
description: Schema for Obsidian plugin manifest.json files

id.description: Unique identifier for the plugin. Must be unique across all plugins.

name.description: Display name of the plugin as shown in the UI

version.description: Current version of the plugin following semantic versioning

minAppVersion.description: Minimum Obsidian version required to run this plugin

description.description: Brief description of what the plugin does

author.description: Name of the plugin author or organization

authorUrl.description: URL to the author's website or profile

oneOf.description: Multiple funding options with display names

isDesktopOnly.description: Whether the plugin only works on desktop (not mobile)
